ygData.subject: Re: Ro quest armor pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello folks,  could someone tell me where this Solusk Ro place is? i haven t the foggiest...don t even know what continent its on, LOL.  And what lvl should
ygData.messageBody:
Hello folks, could someone tell me where this Solusk Ro place is? i haven't
the foggiest...don't even know what continent its on, LOL. And what lvl
should you be before you poke your nose in the place?

Sianne
29th (one hair away from 30th)
Xegony


>From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Ro quest armor pieces
>Date: Tue, 14 Dec 1999 00:56:35 -0500
>
> >I'm trying for the boots, gauntlets, arms bracers, and the caduceus..
> >For those that have done these quests, are they obtainable by a 24th
> >level cleric (i.e., me)? Specifically, the boots (stumpwatch,
> >cabinwatch shouldn't be hard), don't know about the rest. Possible?
> >What level is Babbinsbort? What level is Gull? And how do you get
> >to him?
>
>
>I don't know what level those NPC's are ... but I do know you won't be able
>to do them by yourself. A friend of mine was 34th when he died several
>times trying to solo them =). Certainly though you can take them with a
>group... I think they are certainly in your reach if you want to go for
>them, I wouldn't mind a Caduceus of the Sacrament myself... that is the
>one
>item that is actually pretty good. I wish it had +wisdom, i'm really
>looking for a 1HB that has +wisdom, but it is still very good... high
>damage
>and fast for a 1HB.
>
> As for stump watch and cabin watch... of course you can do those, but
>the problem is that you have to do them in the Kithicore forest... always a
>dangerous thing. I actually have the piece from the cabin... it happened
>to be there as I was running by from WC to rivervale so I only need the
>stump piece.
>
> >Looks like the bracers require killing some mid 30s ghoul, so I will
> >wait on these.
> >What level is the greater darkbone skeleton in Rathe mountains?
>
>
>Again I'm not sure what level he is, but you would probably want to be with
>somebody when you tried it.
>
>I would love to get the bracers myself, but those things you have to kill
>are so rare that I don't really maintain much hope of finding them... and
>now that I have PBB's, they aren't all that important. I will just wait
>until i am able to get runed Mithril bracers instead.
>
> >
> >How do I make galvanized, magnetized, and vulcanized platinum bars?
>
>
>If you ask the person who gives you the quests about galvanized,
>magnatized,
>or vulcanized platinum he will tell you which NPC to give your enchanted
>platinum to. When you give those NPC's an ehchanted bar, they give you a
>bar of galvanized, magnetized, or vulcanized.
>
>-Eachann Bronzeleaf,
>-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>
>
><< text3.html >>
